name: Shark's Song
description:
~

Hilda, a sentient bipedal shark, lives with her creator at the bottom of the sea and tries to avoid public attention... but is this what she really wants?

~

★ A short linear visual novel about dreams and staying true to yourself

★ Playtime: ~5-10 minutes

★ Made in 2 weeks for NaNoReNo'22

Music and sound effects by https://pocket-se.info/
